column1: Hello guys next October we are going to Morocco
column2: it will be a 100% overland trip with a local guide
column3: we will visit amazing places and sleep under a cloak of stars.

column1: We are not a company we are a group of friends who want to share this journey with whoever wants
Hola. Van a dormir en los coches o en hoteles?
Welcome to the Overland Morocco Community – a dedicated space for all overlanders
